database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS Peltigera sp Lichen Average Surface Scrape
entry.description: These samples are Surface Fraction collected from a piece of Peltigera sp. lichen surface. They are extracted by 50:50 Acetonitrile and Water and run by LC-Bruker Maxis Impact.
